view

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.Camera

  • public final class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    A camera set in 3D perspective.
    Author:
    Oskar Veerhoek, author of TheCodingUniverse (www.youtube.com/thecodinguniverse)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Camera

        public Camera(float aspectRatio)
        Creates a new camera with the given aspect ratio. It's located at [0 0 0] with the orientation [0 0 0]. It has a zNear of 0.3, a zFar of 100.0, and an fov of 90.
        Parameters:
        aspectRatio - the aspect ratio (width/height) of the camera

      • Camera

        public Camera(float aspectRatio,
      double x,
      double y,
      double z)
        Creates a new camera with the given aspect ratio and location.
        Parameters:
        aspectRatio - the aspect ratio (width/height) of the camera
        x - the first location coordinate
        y - the second location coordinate
        z - the third location coordinate

      • Camera

        public Camera(float aspectRatio,
      float x,
      float y,
      float z)
        Creates a new camera with the given aspect ratio and location.
        Parameters:
        aspectRatio - the aspect ratio (width/height) of the camera
        x - the first location coordinate
        y - the second location coordinate
        z - the third location coordinate

      • Camera

        public Camera(float aspectRatio,
      double x,
      double y,
      double z,
      double pitch,
      double yaw,
      double roll)
        Creates a new camera with the given aspect ratio, location, and orientation.
        Parameters:
        aspectRatio - the aspect ratio (width/height) of the camera
        x - the first location coordinate
        y - the second location coordinate
        z - the third location coordinate
        pitch - the pitch (rotation on the x-axis)
        yaw - the yaw (rotation on the y-axis)
        roll - the roll (rotation on the z-axis)

      • Camera

        public Camera(float aspectRatio,
      float x,
      float y,
      float z,
      float pitch,
      float yaw,
      float roll)
        Creates a new camera with the given aspect ratio, location, and orientation.
        Parameters:
        aspectRatio - the aspect ratio (width/height) of the camera
        x - the first location coordinate
        y - the second location coordinate
        z - the third location coordinate
        pitch - the pitch (rotation on the x-axis)
        yaw - the yaw (rotation on the y-axis)
        roll - the roll (rotation on the z-axis)

    • Method Detail

      • processMouse

        public void processMouse(float mouseSpeed,
                float maxLookUp,
                float maxLookDown)
        Processes mouse input and converts it in to camera movement using the mouseSpeed value.
        Parameters:
        mouseSpeed - the speed (sensitity) of the mouse
        maxLookUp - the maximum angle at which you can look up
        maxLookDown - the maximum angle at which you can look down

      • processKeyboard

        public void processKeyboard(float delta,
                   float speedX,
                   float speedY,
                   float speedZ)
        Parameters:
        delta - the elapsed time since the last frame update in seconds
        speedX - the speed of the movement on the x-axis (normal = 0.003)
        speedY - the speed of the movement on the y-axis (normal = 0.003)
        speedZ - the speed of the movement on the z-axis (normal = 0.003)
